typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string ('')
}
source(output(
		flight_id as string,
		delay_type as string,
		duration_mins as string,
		delay_code as string,
		delay_code_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> FlightsDelayBlob
FlightsDelayBlob derive(ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp(),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddADFColumns
AddADFColumns sink(input(
		FLT_ID as long,
		DLAY_TYP as string,
		DURTN_MNT as integer,
		DLAY_CD as string,
		DLAY_CD_NAME as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		FLT_ID = flight_id,
		DLAY_TYP = delay_type,
		DURTN_MNT = duration_mins,
		DLAY_CD = delay_code,
		DLAY_CD_NAME = delay_code_name,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteStagingDelay
